name: Reel Black Studios
description: A Black-owned creative animation studio run by husband and wife duo Dara King and Chris Fequiere. They are known for their short film "Burning Rubber" and other animations

name: BWA Studios
description: An animation house that creates and produces programming and content for all platforms. As a Black female-owned studio, they focus on building equity in the animation industry by consciously recruiting Black women, women of color, and nonbinary people of color
